*

Comedy

Jun 21, 2010

A curious rhythmic pounding was emanating from the intercom system in the dark green hallway. Montano stood listening to it while standing among some short bookshelves. It was then that he noticed a tall leprechaun standing just a few feet away from him. This gave him an idea. Now was his time to shine! “Sounds like whoever is on the other end is watching Erarstrehead !” he said with a grin while pointing to the intercom. The leprechaun’s face registered no amusement from this poor attempt at humor. Montano’s smile quickly faded, and he headed upstairs.
